ComicInfo.Summary:
IDW Publishing continues its re-presentation of classic Doctor Who comics from across time and space as the Fourth Doctor goes up against the 'Dogs of Doom' by Pat Mills, John Wagner, and Dave Gibbons, and, in a tale written by Steve Moore, 'The Time Witch!' This latest early tale features all-new colors over Dave Gibbons' classic art. Artist Joe Corroney (Star Trek: Klingons) provides an all-new cover recreating a scene from the classic comics.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/doctor-who-classics-7-the-dogs-of-doom-the-dalek-m/4000-131382/
ComicInfo.Title: The Dogs of Doom: The Dalek Masters; The Time Witch
